segments.en: “Mendicants, these five qualities make a trainee assured.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is faithful, ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.

segments.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, assaddhassa sārajjaṃ hoti, saddhassa taṃ sārajjaṃ na hoti.
segments.en: A person of faith doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who lacks faith.
So this quality makes a trainee assured.

segments.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sārajjaṃ hoti, sīlavato taṃ sārajjaṃ na hoti.
segments.en: An ethical person doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who is unethical.
So this quality makes a trainee assured.

segments.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, appassutassa sārajjaṃ hoti, bahussutassa taṃ sārajjaṃ na hoti.
segments.en: A learned person doesn’t have the insecurities of a person of little learning.
So this quality makes a trainee assured.

segments.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, kusītassa sārajjaṃ hoti, āraddhavīriyassa taṃ sārajjaṃ na hoti.
segments.en: An energetic person doesn’t have the insecurities of a lazy person.
So this quality makes a trainee assured.

segments.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, duppaññassa sārajjaṃ hoti, paññavato taṃ sārajjaṃ na hoti.
segments.en: A wise person doesn’t have the insecurities of someone who is witless.
So this quality makes a trainee assured.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca sekhavesārajjakaraṇā dhammā”ti.
segments.en: These are the five qualities that make a trainee assured.”
